thread.title: christopher griffith
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by christopher griffith

author: christopher griffith
title: christopher griffith
text: I believe these radiators come from the UK... For free... And within a week? Seems impossible. I was very sceptical but ordered as I know this type wall radiator that seems to have not been designed/ made for the backwards American market. Still amazed it arrived so quickly. Will order from here forever
